verse: तद्यथेह कर्मजितो लोकः क्षीयत एवमेवामुत्र पुण्यजितो लोकः क्षीयते तद्य इहात्मानमनुविद्य व्रजन्त्येताश्च सत्यान्कामास्तेषा सर्वेषु लोकेष्वकामचारो भवत्यथ य इहात्मानमनिवुद्य व्रजन्त्येताश्च सत्यान् कामास्तेषा सर्वेषु लोकेषु कामचारो भवति॥
meaning: Meaning:Just as a world obtained through actions perishes in this world, similarly a world obtained through virtues perishes in the next world. Those who know the self in this world attain true desires and become free from desire in all worlds. But those who do not know the self, and are desirous of worldly pleasures, continue to be bound by desire in all worlds.
